item.description:
What: Valentines Schmalentines - Love's Misfits have a night out !

When: Saturday, February 13, 2010 7:00 PM

Price: $10.00 per person

Where:
The Beachcomber
797 Quincy Shore Drive Wallaston Beach
Quincy, MA 02170
617-479-8989

The folks at the Beachcomber are having their annual Anti-Valentines Event. Last years Valentines Schmalentines was a great success with over 125 people!! The Beachcomber is very informal with cheap drinks and a fun atmosphere. It's a perfect venue for those who want to have a coupla cocktails, make some new friends, talk and dance the night away. Johnny Z will be playing all your favorites and keeping the mood light with great collection of music and his good humored entertaining style.

Cash bar with generous portions and cheap drinks ..... Food and entertainment will be provided with cover.

So bring all of your single friends and even your not so single friends for a night of fun and frolic on the lovely Quincy shore - aka The Irish Riviera !!
item.name: Valentines Schmalentines - Love's Misfits Have a Night Out !
